name: gutenberg-simple-blocks-pack
description: Example block scaffolded with Create Block tool.
author: The WordPress Contributors

scripts.add-dynamic: cd src && npx @wordpress/create-block --namespace mcx --category mcx-gsbp-gutenberg-blocks --variant dynamic --no-plugin
scripts.add-static: cd src && npx @wordpress/create-block --namespace mcx --category mcx-gsbp-gutenberg-blocks --variant static --no-plugin
